issue.title: Diffusion properties : HTML problem when included in metadata sheet view
issue.body:
**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

A metadata sheet view is embedded in an html <form> element.

Diffusion properties came in an <form> element and this <form> element is added to the metadata sheet view causing forms imbrication, which is not compatible with html standard.

Most of the internet browsers can deal with that, but not IE9.

Because the <form> element surrounding the metadata sheet view is not needed, we propose to remove it.

**Fixed versions :** 4.3.0
